sources.title: Mohawk (1956)
sources.description: An artist working in a remote army post is juggling the storekeeper's daughter, his fiancée newly arrived from the east, and the Indian Chief's daughter. But when a vengeful settler manages to get the army and the braves at each other's throats his troubles really begin. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/mohawk-1956/

sources.title: Mohawk (1956) SCOTT BRADY
sources.description:
Stars: Scott Brady, Rita Gam, Neville Brand
 Director: Kurt Neumann

 An artist working in a remote army post is juggling the storekeeper's daughter, his fiancee newly arrived from the east, and the Indian Chief's daughter. But when a vengeful settler manages to get the army and the braves at each other's throats his troubles really begin.

metadata.Plot: An artist working in a remote army post is juggling the storekeeper's daughter, his fiancée newly arrived from the east, and the Indian Chief's daughter. But when a vengeful settler manages to get the army and the braves at each other's throats his troubles really begin.
metadata.Actors: Scott Brady, Rita Gam, Neville Brand
